General.Name: Ningbo Xusheng Auto Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Xusheng Group Co.,ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of aluminum alloy die-casting, forging, and extrusion precision auto parts and industrial parts. The company offers precision machining parts for systems, such as transmission, battery, and suspension systems for energy vehicles; and aluminum alloy products of automobile power systems, chassis systems, control systems, suspension systems, battery systems, etc. It also provides battery packs and motor housings. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Xusheng Machinery Co., Ltd. Ningbo Xusheng Group Co.,ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.
General.Address: No. 68, Yanshan River North Road, Ningbo, China, 315806
